text: maybe but for me I'm not a good dancer I just did my best and I just enjoyed dancing and didn't think i was in a competition so I didn't put pressure on myself ðŸ˜‚

I don't have a bf, and the guys here are strict forward if they like the girl they will tell the girl immediately no matter what the girl is. someone is pursuing me here but i rejected him because he is too arrogant

oh interesting, so guys here are pretty direct huh

haha yeah arrogant guys are the worst. like there's confidence and then there's just... too much

so you're single then? not really looking or just haven't found the right person yet?

yes, im still single because i don't like the attitude of the men here, most of them are arrogant so if you rejected them they will tell you that "youre lucky because i chose you but you rejected me" I experienced that with four men as if it was my fault that they confessed to me ðŸ˜‚

haha i like that mindset though, just enjoying it without the pressure. probably why you do well actually

that's kinda the best way to perform honestly, when you're not overthinking

wait four guys said that to you?? ðŸ˜‚

that's such a wild mentality honestly. like "you should be grateful i even noticed you" ... yeah no wonder you rejected them lmao

sounds exhausting dealing with that honestly
yes, it's better to be single with freedom in everything. just based on my experience haha, since in my last relationship he was very strict with me, almost everything I did was forbidden or wrong

damn that sounds rough honestly. like he was controlling everything? that's not a relationship, that's a prison lol

you deserve way better than that. someone who actually respects you and lets you be yourself

glad you got out of that though. makes sense why you value your freedom now

oh yes it's really a blessing to me that he cheated because that's why i woke up to reality and left him right away, since i was so stupid when it comes to love i always hold on to things so it's hard for me to let go haha
yes and because of my past i dont have any standard when dating a man, it doesn't matter if he is rich or poor, and looks don't matter either. all i want is kind and respectful haha

honestly that's such a good standard to have. like kind and respectful sounds basic but it's actually what matters most

lots of people get distracted by looks or money or whatever but at the end of the day if someone treats you like shit none of that matters lol

so yeah makes sense after what you went through. you know what you want now
yes exactly haha, and you, are you in a relationship?

nah i'm single too actually

lol kinda funny we're both in the same boat here. though your reasons sound way more dramatic than mine ðŸ˜‚

mine's more just... work's busy, haven't really met anyone interesting in a while. plus dating apps here are kinda exhausting honestly

ohh i got it we're same hahaha, and yes the dating app is also tiring, I actually tried it, but the people I talk to are not consistent. I mean, they just disappear for a few days and never come back ðŸ˜‚

yeah ghosting is so annoying honestly. like why match with someone if you're not even gonna talk haha

guess it's the same everywhere, people just get bored or find someone else and don't bother saying anything
yes, so many people in the dating apps are like this.  that's why i gave up finding someone on any app, all i talk to are the people who chat with me but if no one chats i dont talk to anyone haha

haha yeah same, i gave up on those apps a while ago

so you just vibe on your own until someone interesting comes along basically?
yes, I just go with the flow, when someone chats, I'll talk until we're comfortable with each other
haha yeah that's a good approach honestly, just let things happen naturally instead of forcing it
yes, but sometimes when someone chats with me weirdly I don't reply, i mean, they fall in love so quickly it's almost unreal haha

haha yeah i know the type, like "i feel like i've known you forever" after two messages ðŸ˜‚

instant red flag honestly
exactly, when i feel like someone is red flagging me, i walk away hahaha because talking to red flag people is just a waste of time ðŸ˜‚
haha yeah smart move. life's too short to waste on people who don't get it
actually ramen with rice is really my go-to, especially when I'm tired ðŸ˜‚
haha ramen and rice together, that's a solid combo honestly. do you go for instant ramen or the real stuff from a shop?
haha yeah, it's really a solid combo ðŸ˜‚ sometimes i go for instant ramen, but more often i get the real stuff from a shop.
what time did you usually go for lunch

usually around 12 or 12:30, depends on work stuff

why, you hungry? haha
ohh okayy i see haha, no  i usually eat lunch at 1pm because our break time is 1pm haha
ah makes sense, that's pretty late lunch though haha. you must get pretty hungry by then
